channel.title: Teachings on ML group, HU Berlin
channel.description: Recent content in Teachings on ML group, HU Berlin

item.title: Algorithms and Datastructures
item.description: I will serve as substitute lecturer for Algorithms and Datastructures on a few occasions. Check out the external course page for more info.

item.title: Machine Learning 1
item.description: I am supervising student projects in the ML 1 exercise, in particular those teams that work on an e-mail spam filter using different ML techniques (see the project page). Additionally, I will act as substitute lecturer on one or two dates.
